equipment.name: Large Spice Refinery
equipment.description: Processes Spice Sand into Spice Melange more efficiently than other spice refineries. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Large Ore Refinery
equipment.description: A refinery capable of producing high-end ingots and resources from raw materials. This ultra-efficient unit will produce higher yields from smaller quantities of raw materials.

equipment.name: Advanced Garment Fabricator
equipment.description: A fabrication unit capable of producing advanced attire, from stillsuits to powerful armor. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Advanced Survival Fabricator
equipment.description: A fabrication unit capable of producing specialized products for survival, exploration, and mining. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Advanced Fremen Deathstill
equipment.description: A complex device capable of extracting water from a corpse. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Fremen Deathstill
equipment.description: A complex device capable of extracting water from a corpse. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Advanced Vehicle Fabricator
equipment.description: A fabrication unit capable of producing components for advanced vehicles like the Buggy or Ornithopter. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Advanced Weapons Fabricator
equipment.description: A fabrication unit capable of producing advanced weaponry. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Fabricator
equipment.description: A fabrication unit capable of producing complex items. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Small Chemical Refinery
equipment.description: Refinery capable of processing raw resources into Cobalt Ingots, Silicone Blocks, and Fuel Cell Packs. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Small Ore Refinery
equipment.description: Processes raw Copper ore, Carbon ore, and Iron ore into Refined Resources. Can also create Steel ingots from Iron and Carbon.

equipment.name: Spice Refinery
equipment.description: Processes Spice Sand into valuable Spice Melange. Can be sold or used in further crafting. Must be powered through additional base power installations.

equipment.name: Garment Fabricator
equipment.description: Machine that can craft advanced attire, from stillsuits to powerful armor. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Must be powered through additional base power installations to function.

equipment.name: Survival Fabricator
equipment.description: Machine that can craft specialized products for survival, exploration, mining. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Needs power.

equipment.name: Vehicle Fabricator
equipment.description: Machine that can craft advanced vehicles like the Buggy or Ornithopter. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Must be powered through additional base power installations to function.

equipment.name: Weapons Fabricator
equipment.description: Machine that can craft advanced weaponry. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Must be powered through additional base power installations to function.

equipment.name: Medium Ore Refinery
equipment.description: A refinery capable of producing Aluminum and Duraluminum ingots from raw Aluminum and Jasmium ore.

equipment.name: Large Water Cistern
equipment.description: Fragile container for storing a large quantity of water that can be utilized in the operation of multiple base production units. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Medium Water Cistern
equipment.description: Fragile container for storing water that can be utilized in the operation of multiple base production units. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Medium Chemical Refinery
equipment.description: A medium-sized Chemical Refinery. Can be used to refine resources with better efficiency. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Medium Spice Refinery
equipment.description: Processes Spice Sand into Spice Melange more efficiently than the Small Spice Refinery. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Large Windtrap
equipment.description: Machine that collects a lot of water from the environment over time, re-routable between base production and storage structures. Requires a Filter for operation. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Medium Storage Container
equipment.description: A medium external storage container. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Its contents can be accessed by devices throughout a base via the included storage circuits.

equipment.name: Storage Container
equipment.description: An enlarged external storage container. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Its contents can be accessed by devices throughout a base via the included storage circuits.

equipment.name: Recycler
equipment.description: Machine that disassembles an item, returning a portion of its component materials. The quantity of returned materials is dependent on the condition of the recycled item. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Small Storage Container
equipment.description: A small external storage container. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Its contents can be accessed throughout a base via the included storage circuits.

equipment.name: Chest
equipment.description: An external storage container. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Its contents can be accessed by devices throughout a base via the included storage circuits.

equipment.name: Sub-Fief Console
equipment.description: Essential device that claims a piece of land to build on. Place with the Construction Tool. The console can generate a shield that will protect a base from damage when powered by a generator placed nearby.

equipment.name: Advanced Sub-Fief Console
equipment.description: This console claims a large piece of land to build on, which can be further expanded with staking units. Land claimed with this device is subject to a recurring Solari tax which can be paid in cities.

equipment.name: Blood Purifier
equipment.description: A filtration system capable of extracting water from blood collected in a Blood Sack. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Improved Blood Purifier
equipment.description: A filtration system capable of extracting water from blood collected in a Blood Sack. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires power from a base power generator to operate.

equipment.name: Repair Station
equipment.description: Machine that can restore lost durability in items. Each time an item is repaired its maximum durability decreases. Repairs require appropriate materials and schematics. Placed with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Pentashield Surface Horizontal
equipment.description: Pentashield Surface Horizontal

equipment.name: Pentashield Surface Vertical
equipment.description: Pentashield Surface Vertical

equipment.name: Roof Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: Any roof piece that can be used to cover a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Floor Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: Any floor piece that can be used to cover a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Hatch Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: Any hatch piece that can be use to create a horizontal opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Wall Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: Any wall piece that can be use to enclose a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Door - Stronghold
equipment.description: A basic door piece that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Prudence Door - Stronghold
equipment.description: A pentashield door piece that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Wide Door - Stronghold
equipment.description: A wider door piece that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Tall Door - Stronghold
equipment.description: A tall door piece that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Column Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: A column piece that can be use to create vertical support in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Pillar Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: A pillar piece that can be use to create vertical support in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Foundation Piece - Stronghold
equipment.description: A foundation piece that can be use to create a base for a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.description: Any roof piece that can be used to cover a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.name: Door - CHOAM

equipment.name: Passageway - CHOAM
equipment.description: A passageway that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.description: A wider door piece that can be use to create a vertical opening in a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

equipment.description: A foundation piece that can be use to create a base for a building. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

power.name: Spice-Powered Generator
power.description: A wind-driven turbine that generates a large amount of re-routable power for base production structures. Requires Lubricant for operation. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

power.name: Wind Turbine Directional
power.description: A wind-driven turbine that generates a large amount of re-routable power for base production structures. Requires Lubricant for operation. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.

power.name: Wind Turbine Omnidirectional
power.description: A wind-driven turbine that generates a large amount of re-routable power for base production structures. Requires Lubricant for operation. Place close to a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool.
